name: Captive
description: "Captive" tells the story of a woman who awakens badly hurt in an unknown cell, without any memories about herself. Will you be able to escape?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
